# withGroup(resultType:returning:body:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Swift ](/documentation/swift)

- [ Task ](/documentation/swift/task)

- [ withGroup(resultType:returning:body:) ](/documentation/Swift/Task/withGroup(resultType:returning:body:))

- [ Task ](/documentation/swift/task)

-  withGroup(resultType:returning:body:) 

Type Method# withGroup(resultType:returning:body:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
static func withGroup<TaskResult, BodyResult>(
    resultType: TaskResult.Type,
    returning returnType: BodyResult.Type = BodyResult.self,
    body: (inout Task<Success, Failure>.Group<TaskResult>) async throws -> BodyResult
) async rethrows -> BodyResult where TaskResult : Sendable
```

Available when `Success` is `Never` and `Failure` is `Never`.Deprecated

`Task.withGroup` was replaced by `withThrowingTaskGroup` and `withTaskGroup` and will be removed shortly.
